# bunnynet_database (Resource)

This resource manages an Database in bunny.net.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bunnynet_database" "test" {
  name            = "mydb"
  regions_primary = ["DE", "NY", "SG"]
  regions_replica = ["LA", "UK", "SYD"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the database.
- `regions_primary` (Set of String)

### Optional

- `regions_replica` (Set of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the database.
- `url` (String) The connection URL for the database.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import bunnynet_database.test db_01KF0XCACH2JDPGHZT3284MZ2V
```
